meta.name: description
meta.content: The Armstrong School District, in partnership with our families and communities, will graduate educationally prepared, productive, morally responsible individuals.

h1.a: School Board Vacancy - Letters of Interest Being Accepted

article.div: Letters of interest will be accepted until April 24 for an upcoming vacancy in Region I. Please click the link above for more information.

The emergency meal program will not run on Friday April 10th and Monday April 13th. due to Spring Break for the School District Staff.
Thank you

U.S. Secretary of Education Betsy DeVos announced today that federal law should not be used to prevent schools from offering distance learning opportunities to all students, including students with disabilities. Click link above for more information.
